TopicTitle: [Cinematic] Kerbal Space Program - New Year Special

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Today i want to show a my new video from KSP.

This Movie says about the celebration of new year 2015 by Kerbals!

comments are welcome ^^

what can i say? It begins lika a old gold Apollo style movie. But suddenly something go wronh and Jeb's Grin remenber all remenber that's no Moon! And this is our little Kerbal sandbox called mun!

Great edition! i liked specially the design, is that stock? And that moon shine is some kind of mod?

Please mr. Skyline make more videos this way (cinematics). How about one where the koviets came to try to rescue bill and Jeb?
